value.stringValue:
Dear colleague,


Kindly be informed that the Customer Complaint ID: {!$Record.CaseNumber} has been Completed by {!$Record.LastModifiedBy.FirstName} {!$Record.LastModifiedBy.LastName}.


Reminders (Case Owner / Customer Caretaker): 

If complaint costs are still pending, document final costs at a later time.

Now that youâ€™ve completed the case, if any of the 8D complaint fields need to be updated/changed, submit a Synserv ticket to request the case to be moved back to the "Customer Feedback" stage to enable editing.


Next Steps (Case Owner): Complete and document Effectiveness Check to show that the corrective actions taken to address the complaint have been effective. 


Best regards,


Your CRM Support Team


Link to Case in mySalesForce: {!$Record.CaseNumber} : {!$Record.Subject}


The mySalesForce system automatically generated this message.

Dear colleague,


Kindly be informed that the Customer Complaint ID: {!$Record.CaseNumber} has been changed to a status Corrective Action Implementation by {!$Record.LastModifiedBy.FirstName} {!$Record.LastModifiedBy.LastName}.

Next Steps (Case Owner): Confirm implementation of corrective actions and identification of preventive actions. Continue documenting complaint costs. 

Next Steps (Customer Caretaker): If for Henkel or if requested by customer, send completed 8D Report per Sales' direction.

Best regards,


Your CRM Support Team


Link to Case in mySalesForce: {!$Record.CaseNumber} : {!$Record.Subject}


The mySalesForce system automatically generated this message.

Dear colleague,


Kindly be informed that the Customer Complaint ID: {!$Record.CaseNumber} has been changed to a status Customer Feedback by {!$Record.LastModifiedBy.FirstName} {!$Record.LastModifiedBy.LastName}.

Next Steps (Customer Caretaker): Send 5D Report to customer per Sales' direction and document customer feedback.  

Best regards,


Your CRM Support Team


Link to Case in mySalesForce: {!$Record.CaseNumber} : {!$Record.Subject}


The mySalesForce system automatically generated this message.

Dear colleague,


Kindly be informed that the Customer Complaint ID: {!$Record.CaseNumber} has been assessed as High/Very High severity by {!$Record.LastModifiedBy.FirstName} {!$Record.LastModifiedBy.LastName}.


Best regards,


Your CRM Support Team


Link to Case in mySalesForce: {!$Record.CaseNumber} : {!$Record.Subject}


The mySalesForce system automatically generated this message.

Dear colleague,


Kindly be informed that the Customer Complaint ID: {!$Record.CaseNumber} has been changed to a status Investigation by {!$Record.LastModifiedBy.FirstName} {!$Record.LastModifiedBy.LastName}.


Next Steps (Customer Caretaker): If for Henkel or if requested by customer, send completed 3D Report to customer.


Next Steps (Case Owner & Case Team): During investigation, determine if the complaint is justified or *not justified. If justified, continue with full root cause analysis and identification/documentation of corrective actions.


*If complaint is not justified, stop further investigation, document reason, and select No in "Complaint Justified" field / reason to notify the Customer Caretaker to communicate this to the customer. 

Best regards,


Your CRM Support Team


Link to Case in mySalesForce: {!$Record.CaseNumber} : {!$Record.Subject}


The mySalesForce system automatically generated this message.

Dear colleague,


Kindly be informed that the Customer Complaint ID: {!$Record.CaseNumber} has been reclassified from Unjustified to Justified by {!$Record.LastModifiedBy.FirstName} {!$Record.LastModifiedBy.LastName}.


Best regards,


Your CRM Support Team


Link to Case in mySalesForce: {!$Record.CaseNumber} : {!$Record.Subject}


The mySalesForce system automatically generated this message.

Dear colleague,


Kindly note that the Very High/High Customer Complaint ID: {!$Record.CaseNumber} has been re-assessed to Medium/Low severity by {!$Record.LastModifiedBy.FirstName} {!$Record.LastModifiedBy.LastName}.


Best regards,


Your CRM Support Team


Link to Case in mySalesForce: {!$Record.CaseNumber} : {!$Record.Subject}


The mySalesForce system automatically generated this message.

Dear colleague,


Kindly be informed that the Customer Complaint ID: {!$Record.CaseNumber} has been identified as an Unjustified Complaint. It is the responsibility of Customer Service to communicate this designation and the reason to the customer. The process will continue to closure without a corrective action being taken.


Best regards,


Your CRM Support Team


Link to Case in mySalesForce: {!$Record.CaseNumber} : {!$Record.Subject}


The mySalesForce system automatically generated this message.

Dear colleague,


Kindly note that the Case Owner for Customer Complaint ID: {!$Record.CaseNumber} has been changed to {!$Record.Owner:User.FirstName} {!$Record.Owner:User.LastName}.

Best regards,


Your CRM Support Team


Link to Case in mySalesForce: {!$Record.CaseNumber} : {!$Record.Subject}


The mySalesForce system automatically generated this message.

Dear colleague,


Kindly be informed that the Customer Complaint ID: {!$Record.CaseNumber} has been changed from Completed to a status {!$Record.Status} by {!$Record.LastModifiedBy.FirstName} {!$Record.LastModifiedBy.LastName}.

Best regards,


Your CRM Support Team


Link to Case in mySalesForce: {!$Record.CaseNumber} : {!$Record.Subject}


The mySalesForce system automatically generated this message.

Dear colleague,


Kindly note that the Service Team for Customer Complaint ID: {!$Record.CaseNumber} has been changed to {!$Record.Service_Team__r.Name}.

Best regards,


Your CRM Support Team


Link to Case in mySalesForce: {!$Record.CaseNumber} : {!$Record.Subject}


The mySalesForce system automatically generated this message.

Flow.description: Sends notifications after a record is inserted or updated based on specific conditions. Note - If you are changing the flow API name please update the Get Bypass flow - user related flow element

formulas.name: varHighSeverityType
formulas.expression: CASE({!$Record.Global_Business_Unit__c}, 'Coatings & Construction', 'CCS_High_Severity_Recipient', 'Adhesive Solutions', 'AS_High_Severity_Recipient', 'Health & Protection and Perf. Materials', 'HPPM_High_Severity_Recipient', '')

formulas.name: varSubjectHighSeverity
formulas.expression: 'Notification of Very High/High Severity on Customer Complaint ' + {!$Record.CaseNumber} + ': ' + {!$Record.Subject}

formulas.name: varSubjectReducedSeverity
formulas.expression: 'Notification of Reduced Severity on Customer Complaint ' + {!$Record.CaseNumber} + ': ' + {!$Record.Subject}

Flow.label: Case - After Insert/Update - Send Notifications
